>
[Strong Arm](/Feats.aspx?ID=4927) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

---

When you [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89) with a thrown weapon, the weapon’s [range increment](/Rules.aspx?ID=227) increases by 10 feet.
